comment: This app came from a 4.5star to a 1star. I'm aorry but it's functionality over features. It has many feature's but too many bugs. When I'm editing something for example, i press play and the timeline is not moving at all. I have 0 ways to use it. It literally is good only for TikTok templates and not even for that cause even there the clip si moving in 3fps.
scenarios: When editing something and pressing play, the timeline is not moving at all.
When using TikTok templates, the clip is moving in 3fps.
key sentence: When editing something and pressing play, the timeline is not moving at all.
the function of activity: This activity focuses on editing, exporting, adjusting, and managing the audio and video elements of multimedia templates.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Extract Audio', 'description': 'Initiate the process to extract audio from a selected multimedia file or track.'}, {'name': 'Add Sound', 'description': 'Add a new sound to the current media project or playlist.'}, {'name': 'Play/Pause Audio', 'description': 'Toggle the play or pause state of the audio track using the play/pause icon.'}, {'name': 'Edit audio', 'description': 'Trim or adjust the volume of the audio of the vedio.'}]

comment: This app came from a 4.5star to a 1star. I'm aorry but it's functionality over features. It has many feature's but too many bugs. When I'm editing something for example, i press play and the timeline is not moving at all. I have 0 ways to use it. It literally is good only for TikTok templates and not even for that cause even there the clip si moving in 3fps.
scenarios: When editing something and pressing play, the timeline is not moving at all.
When using TikTok templates, the clip is moving in 3fps.
key sentence: When editing something and pressing play, the timeline is not moving at all.
the function of activity: This activity focuses on editing, exporting, adjusting, and managing the audio and video elements of multimedia templates.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Extract Audio', 'description': 'Initiate the process to extract audio from a selected multimedia file or track.'}, {'name': 'Add Sound', 'description': 'Add a new sound to the current media project or playlist.'}, {'name': 'Play/Pause Audio', 'description': 'Toggle the play or pause state of the audio track using the play/pause icon.'}, {'name': 'Edit audio', 'description': 'Trim or adjust the volume of the audio of the vedio.'}]
